Simple, and perfect for winter. And you can layer these socks with others. They wash well and easy to get dirt out of with baking soda and bleach for the white socks!
Perfect!
I purchase cotton socks all the time. Usually 60 % but found these at 80% cotton and they feel bad on my skin.  Pretty but doesn’t feel good on delicate skin for 80% cotton.
Two months in and they are not falling down my ankle. Not bad for the price
The elastic to these socks are so bad, they roll down

评论详情: I have purchased several of these packs over the year. All sets are colorful, comfortable, and great to wear or share. Great for gifting these sets.

评论概述: I love the feel and softness

These socks are cute, soft, and high-quality.
Super soft and held up well after washing. Simple socks for everyday wear.
Soft, well fiting and just the right amount of elastic.
Economical ,lightweight and comfortable.
Really cute!
These were exactly what I was looking for. Thin and comfy and a really good price.

They’re cute . A little thinner that what I expected
Nice quality

Thin but it's alright
Cute socks, good quality, love wearing them.
these sock are comfortable and don’t make my ankle swell
Very nice dress socks, me and my youngest daughter Fort share socks and we both love

Nice colors. But fall down

They fit well and are longer at the ankle.  I love the earth tones, but worry about durability.  They're super thin.
These socks are thinner than expected. However, for the price and quantity of colors, it is worth it. Perfect to pair with ankle boots, that’s what I bought them for.
I like the color variety of these socks and they are really comfy and fit well!

So far the socks have held up without and loose strands. I find the colors to match with almost of my garments making it a convenient and fashion savvy purchase. Pleased with this purchase and will purchase more.
I bought these to wear with my boots. I've opened the first pair and this is what I found.
The athletic aesthetic combined with the casual and neutral colors creates a timeless look that complements any outfit

These socks did not disappoint. They are nice and lightweight without feeling cheap (as if they’ll disintegrate after one wash). I love the color options too. If you’re a contemporary dancer, these are perfect practice socks!
A bit too tight around the ankles. Maybe not so good for a wider foot.
I am obsessed with these socks, I’ve tried many like ankle socks and these by far are my favorite. super soft and comfy!!
Cute slouchy socks. Nice variety of colors. Colors are deeper/warmer/more vibrant than other brands I've tried (more burgundy undertones to browns, more yellow to off-white).

I love the way these socks looks with above the ankle boots. They don't move around inside the boot, they're very lightweight, but not too thin, and they are buttery soft. The colors are chic and they seem high-quality. They're also nicely packaged.
Socks have 0 stretchy material.. really nice formal socks

These are my new go-to socks! I wear them all the time and I love that they come with all the shades of neutral! The ribbed design really just elevates them and the seam doesn’t bother me like some socks do
They aren’t as thick or long as advertised.

I like that they came in a large pack with lots of colors. They are soft and lightweight. I have larger calves, and they are a bit smaller around my calves, but they do not feel tight or uncomfortable. I would recommend these for summer season, as they are very thin, and not very warm. A great basic essential. I have washed them a few times and they seem to be pretty sturdy.
These socks not only look pretty but they are comfortable and made with nice cotton. They come in neutral colors which means there’s a pair for virtually every outfit. I love the look of them.
Very comfortable and cute. They are not tight or restricting but also don't slip and stay in place. The seams are also very thin so they are not irritating. I really like these socks.

I got these socks in hopes they would go well with boots this winter and they sure do! I am about a size 6 in women's shoes and I ordered the size range 5-9 and they fit great. They hit me just above my ankle and are not too lose or tight. They are lightweight and breathable, so if you are looking for thick socks then you might want to look somewhere else. I really like the ribbed material and neutral colors. These socks will pair nicely with many outfits and shoes.
Very soft, true to size well made socks
They are very soft ad comfortable. The colors are also suitably subdued and will not make you feel cheap. It didn't come with weird smells when I received it.

评论概述: Cute and good length for boots!
评论详情: These socks are simple, cute, and the perfect length for booties or to do a scrunch with athletic shoes. They are not soft which is a little disappointing, but I would still buy them again!
This pack of socks has a great assortment of colors from white to black and 6 shades of brown in between.  Well made, soft, comfortable and all-around great socks at an unbeatable price.

I wasn't sure what to expect for thickness since crew socks are usually a bit on the thicker side. These are great, thin business socks. They don't need folding over, come just above the ankle, and for someone that does not wear socks if I don't have to, they are surprisingly easy to forget you have on. Good pick!

The 6 pairs of Crew Socks for Women have proven to be a wardrobe essential, seamlessly combining athletic functionality with an aesthetic touch. Crafted from soft and breathable cotton, these socks offer comfort throughout the day, whether for casual outings or more active pursuits. The neutral design makes them versatile enough to pair with various outfits, adding a subtle yet stylish element to my daily ensembles. The crew length provides ample coverage and support, making them suitable for a range of activities. The athletic aesthetic ensures they look just as good with sneakers as they do with casual shoes. With a perfect blend of comfort, style, and functionality, these crew socks have become a reliable and go-to choice in my sock collection for all occasions.

These socks are very comfortable and well made. The seam at the toe line is thin and barely noticeable making for a nice wear. They are a thinner material yet keep my feet warm. They don't slide around inside my boots or shoes like some socks do. I'm very pleased with the selection of neutral colors as they are easy to match different shades of browns and creams.

I suppose i should have reviewed the product specs a bit more before ordering. They are not very “slouchy” at the top, which is the look I was wanting. Otherwise, these are very basic comfortable socks. I do like the ribbed look. They were also packaged quite nice.

Ordered this specifically for the neutral colors. These are great to match you clothes when your socks are going to show. Traditional crew socks style and size. They are comfortable with the perfect amount of stretch
Cute set. They are very soft, comfy and stylish. Washed a few times and they kept their color.

These socks are thin, lightweight, comfortable and go with everything.  I got the neutral color set and it came with six pairs. I wear shoe size 7.5 and these fit just right. The socks are nice and soft, and good for warm weather.  However, for very cold weather like it was the other morning, my toes did get very cold!  So for everyday use (except cold days) these socks are great!

I love these, they are basically just cotton socks but the shade variety is enough for outfits/fashion, I found the 8 pack a great deal with the variety of shades available and all socks were perfect, no issues.

I wear a size 9.5 and these fit fine in the foot even though it says they are for sizes 5-9.  They may be slightly tight in the ankles - but I notice they don't have the extra stretchy reinforcement at the top of the sock. Usually there is a stretchy band  - these just have the same fabric the whole length of the sock. Not a huge deal since they are dress socks not tube socks. They do the trick.

I received 6 (not 8) pairs of socks in 6 different, neutral colors.  These are thin/light ribbed socks with a non-binding finish around the top, and the sizing seems to be in accordance with the stated range.  According to the listing, these are 85% cotton.  The packaging did not include a statement of fiber content, but they are comfortable against the skin.  I have not yet washed and dried these and feel some concern about that, as the first recommendation was hand washing, and I will definitely not be hand washing them.  I will update if they end up getting ruined.
These socks feel lightweight but good quality, comfy, and they are very cute! They fit perfectly, and I love the length. Really pretty colors, and a great value!

I really am enjoying wearing these 'Hstyle' socks; it's very nice that this set came with 8 pairs, and that they're all neutral in color so they go with nearly any outfit..  I like that these socks are soft, and that they go up further than the normal ankle socks I usually wear. These are a perfect length, in my opinion; they're longer, but can be folded down for a cute look. They look nice with sneakers, dressy shoes, loafers, boots, etc. 👟👢 👞🥿😊  They're very comfortable, and fit my feet well. They do have some stretch to them as well. Additionally, they've stayed nice throughout washing/drying, without any signs of wear or tear.  This is a very nice sock set, and with 8 pairs, I think the cost is fairly reasonable. This would also be a nice gift. I'm quite happy with these socks. 😊

These come in a plastic box. They are each a different shade of brown. They feel comfortable to my feet. They are not super warm socks, they feel kind of thin. (I am used to thick winter socks) That thinness is probably just what you want for a more dressy sock. For a dressy type sock they are not thin. The ribbing goes all the way to the toes on the top of the sock. Overall, I like them.

These are great socks for a foot that wears a size 6 shoe.  I find it very difficult to find cuffed socks, which I find more comfortable than socks with elastic tops, so I was happy to add these to my sock collection.  They are mostly cotton and for a heavy sock, they are thin and very luxurious.  They have a ribbed top that keeps the sock close to your foot and they are very comfortable inside my shoes.  The tasteful colors are also nice.  I will be ordering more of these.

This is a nice 8-pack of socks in a variety of colors. The pairs of socks come nicely packaged and neatly wrapped in individual rolls. The socks themselves feel soft and warm. I like the colors. I think they'd make a nice gift.

I knew these were going to be great socks as soon as I saw the packaging. These aren't thick winter socks, but they're also not dress socks, which I don't like because dress socks have a 'slippery' feel, in my opinion. I put on a pair and walked the dog 2 miles and they were comfortable and stayed in place. I love this type of sock when I wear jeans and dress boots in the fall and winter. They feel well made. And, the ultimate bonus? I have a German Shephard that sheds constantly. I vacuum daily but there's always fur. I have socks that the fur sticks to, but not these socks. I don't have to take a roller to the bottom of my feet before putting on shoes.

Natural colors. Great to wear with mini Uggs. I like the length and I can make it shorter by scrunching socks down. Soft fabric. Simple and aesthetic. Comfortable. Fabric is just the right thickness for me. Great quality.
These socks come packaged like a luxury upscale item. They are really nice and come in handy for the cold days ahead. I like the neutral colors and the socks are great quality.
